Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.weaponry.constraints

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlignmentConstraint
    An AlignmentConstraint requires either that two cells are aligned, or that they are not aligned, in order to be eligible for being the Target of an Effect.
    Constraint
    A constraint is a simple rule that can be verified or falsified.
    DistanceConstraint
    A DistanceConstraint requires that the distance separating two cells be within a specific interval of values in order for either cell to be eligible for being chosen as a Target.
    IdentityConstraint
    An IdentityConstraint requires either that two Players actually be the same Player, or the opposite, requiring two different identities from the two Players.
    OrderConstraint
    An OrderConstraint requires that three cells be aligned and in the order listed.
    RoomConstraint
    A RoomConstraint may require that two Rooms be the same in order to satisfy the constraint.
    VisibilityConstraint
    A VisibilityConstraint requires that a cell be visible from another.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConstraintType
    An enumeration containing the four possible Activity types.
